means: <贬>极端或过分拘谨的人，（尤指对性问题）大惊小怪的人

derivation.yuyuan_name: early 18th cent.: from French, back-formation from prudefemme, feminine of prud'homme 'good man and true', from prou 'worthy'

entry.tran: （在性问题上）大惊小怪的人，过分正经的人；谈性色变的人
entry.def: If you call someone a prude, you mean that they are too easily shocked by things relating to sex.

means.word_mean: 1. a person excessively concerned about propriety and decorum
